acepta_comunicaciones: I wish to receive commercial communications and news from SportTracker.
acepta_rgpd_1: I have read and accept the
avatar_temporada: You can include a new avatar each season
callback_text2: Your browser might be blocking local storage or you opened the callback in another tab. If it stays here, go back and repeat the login from the same tab.
claim: Your sports history, season by season
competicion_nombre_info: For example: pre-season, tournaments, league, playoffs...
consulta_texto: Tell us briefly about your queryâ€¦
contacto_acepta_condiciones: I accept the use of my data to manage this contact request.
contacto_text2: Fill out the form and we will reply shortly.
contacto_text3: Thank you! We have received your message and will reply as soon as possible.
cuenta_cancelar_texto: Are you sure you want to cancel your account? This action cannot be undone.
cuenta_cancelar_texto_modal: If you cancel your account, you will lose access to all data and features of the application. This action is irreversible.
cuenta_sin_recibos: There are no receipts for this account.
dashboard_suscribete_texto: To start registering athletes you must subscribe to one of our plans.
equipo_necesita_club_aviso: To create a team, you must first create a club.
equipo_nombre_info: For example: Junior A, Cadet B, Orange Youth,...
error_asientos_indisponibles: You do not have any more athlete registrations available. Renew your subscription.
facturas_recientes_detalle: Latest payments processed on your account.
facturas_vacias_detalle: Once you complete a payment, the invoice will appear here.
imagenes_guarda_local: Images are saved locally on your device. They are not uploaded to any server.
player_nuevo_texto2: Next, indicate all the participations the athlete has in one or more sports and categories.
recibos_ver_question: Do you need all your receipts?
sesion_iniciar_aviso: You must log in to subscribe.
suscripcion_activa_sin: You do not have any active subscriptions at the moment.
suscripcion_necesaria: You must purchase a subscription plan before creating athletes.
suscripcion_sin_recibos: There are no receipts for this subscription.
suscripcion_texto1: Register an athlete if you have a valid free access code. If you want to register more than one athlete, you must indicate it in the form.
suscripcion_texto2: You can register 1 athlete with an access code. If you need to add more athletes, you must complete the payment via Stripe. You can always create one now with a code and add more later via Stripe.
stripe_products_description: Manage your Stripe catalog from a single place.
stripe_product_modal_subtitle: Set a name, description, and optionally an initial price.
stripe_product_description_placeholder: Describe the product for your customers.
stripe_product_create_price_help: When enabled, a default price will be generated automatically in Stripe.
stripe_product_price_hint: Enter the amount in the selected currency; we will convert it to the correct unit amount.
stripe_prices_description: Define the amounts and currencies of your plans in Stripe.
stripe_price_modal_subtitle: Configure the amount, currency, and charge type.
stripe_price_amount_hint: It will be converted to the correct unit amount automatically.
stripe_price_type_hint: After creation you can only activate or deactivate the price.
stripe_price_manage_subtitle: You can enable or disable the price and adjust its internal name. To change the amount create a new price.
stripe_price_manage_status_hint: Use this switch to enable or disable the price for new purchases.
stripe_price_confirm_archive_description: When you archive a price it remains available for existing subscriptions but can't be used for new purchases.
stripe_price_replace_description: Enter the details of the new price. The previous price will be archived automatically afterwards.
stripe_price_replace_error: We couldn't create the new price.
stripe_payments_description: Review the status of one-off charges processed through Stripe.
stripe_payments_empty: There are no one-time payments yet.
stripe_subscriptions_description: Track subscription status and renewal periods.
stripe_coupons_description: Manage the discount codes available in Stripe.
stripe_coupons_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this coupon? This action cannot be undone.
partido_eliminar_texto_modal: If you delete this match, all its data and associated files will be removed. This action is irreversible.
stripe_coupons_create_success_descriptio: The coupon has been created successfully.
stripe_coupons_create_duration_months_in: Enter a valid number of months.
stripe_coupons_edit_metadata_hint: Provide a JSON object with key-value pairs.
stripe_invoices_description: Monitor invoice statuses, due dates, and outstanding balances.
stripe_invoices_filters_search_placehold: Search by customer, number, or ID

sections.title: 1. Owner details
sections.html:
The website and the {{product.app_name}} app ({{product.domain}}) are owned by {{company.name}}, VAT {{company.nif}}, {{company.address}}, {{company.country}}. Contact: {{company.email}}.

Trade registry: {{company.reg_merc}}

sections.title: 2. Purpose and acceptance
sections.html: Accessing {{product.app_name}} implies acceptance of this Legal Notice and, where applicable, the Terms of Use.

sections.title: 3. Users and minors
sections.html: The service is for adults. Children under 16 cannot create an account. Adults may record sports data of third parties pursuant to the Content & Image Policy.

sections.title: 4. IP rights
sections.html: Software and design belong to {{company.name}} or its licensors.

sections.title: 5. Liability
sections.html: {{company.name}} is not liable for user-stored data, images or videos on the device, nor for misuse of the app.

sections.title: 6. Third-party services
sections.html: We integrate Supabase (EU/Ireland), Stripe (payments), {{providers.hosting}} (hosting) and {{providers.analytics}} (analytics). See the Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 7. Governing law
sections.html: Spanish law applies. Consumer jurisdiction rules prevail.

sections.title: 1. Controller
sections.html: Controller: {{company.name}} ({{company.email}}). No DPO appointed for now.

sections.title: 2. Data we process
sections.html:
• Account: name, surname, email, optional phone.
  • Service use: sports stats created by the user about third parties.
  • Media: images/videos stored locally, not in cloud.
  • Payments: handled by Stripe.
  • Analytics: {{providers.analytics}}.

sections.title: 3. Purposes & legal bases
sections.html:
• Service & subscription (contract).
  • Analytics (consent).
  • Renewal notifications (consent).
  • Security/fraud (legitimate interest).

sections.title: 4. Retention
sections.html:
• Account and records while account exists. Billing data: 6 years.
  • Security logs: 12 months.

sections.title: 5. Recipients
sections.html:
• Supabase (EU/Ireland)
  • Stripe
  • {{providers.hosting}}
  • {{providers.analytics}}

sections.title: 6. Rights
sections.html: Contact {{legal.data_subject_email}} to exercise GDPR rights. Response within one month.

sections.title: 7. Minors
sections.html: Under-16s cannot create an account. Adults must ensure consent to process minors' images/data.

sections.title: 1. What cookies we use
sections.html: Only necessary cookies and, if consented, analytics ({{providers.analytics}}).

sections.title: 2. Categories
sections.html:
• Necessary: login, security.
  • Analytics: usage measurement (consent-based).
  • Functional: non-essential improvements.
  • Marketing: currently unused.

sections.title: 3. List
sections.html:
Necessary

  • Supabase session: {{cookies.session}}
  • Stripe: {{cookies.stripe}}

Analytics

  • GA4: {{cookies.ga4}}

sections.title: 4. Manage consent
sections.html: Use the cookie banner or your browser settings to withdraw consent.

sections.title: 1. Purpose
sections.html: Terms for using {{product.app_name}}.

sections.title: 1. Purchase
sections.html: Payments via Stripe. 14-day withdrawal right as applicable.

sections.title: 1. Scope
sections.html: Rules for user content and image rights.
